subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: American Christian Vande Velde, riding in the Tour de France for the Garmin-Slipstream team, gives a first-hand account from Tuesday’s team time trial.
snippet: American Christian Vande Velde, riding in the Tour de France for the Garmin-Slipstream team, gives a first-hand account from Tuesday’s team time trial.
